title: Jasim was in a Cage, from "The Amman Project"
marks: Signature, Date, Edition and Chop LRC, in pencil: [D. Heyman 2006]
description: line drawing-style portrait of a bald man with a heavy round face, his PL hand held to his chin; man wears checkered jacket, shirt and tie; text above and around figure
creditline: Gift of funds from Allen Brookins-Brown
